```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidyNano)
library(cowplot)
library(themesoo)
```

```{r}
my_file <- "PBS_LPS_-ExperimentSummary.csv"


data <- nanoimport(my_file, NTA_version = 3.2)

data
```
```{r}
tidy_df <- data %>%
  nanotidy(2:51, sep_var = c("Condition", "Bio_rep","Dilution", "Tech_rep"))


tidy_df
```

```{r}
tidy_df %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = particle_size, y = True_count, color = Tech_rep)) +
  geom_line() +
  facet_wrap(Bio_rep~Condition, ncol = 2)
```
```{r}
tech_rep_df <- tidy_df %>% 
  nanolyze(particle_size, Condition, Bio_rep,name = "Tech_rep", param_var = True_count)

tech_rep_df



tech_rep_df %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = particle_size, y = Tech_rep_mean, color = Bio_rep)) +
  geom_line() +
  facet_wrap(~Condition)
```
```{r}
tech_rep_count_df <- tidy_df %>% 
  nanocount(Condition, Bio_rep,Tech_rep,
            name = "Tech_rep", param_var = True_count)

tech_rep_count_df
```

```{r}
tech_rep_count_df %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = Condition, y = Tech_rep_count, color = Condition)) +
  geom_jitter(width = 0.2)  +
  facet_wrap(~Bio_rep)
```
